title: PC WIN 10 frezzes
body: PC freezes while just sitting in home screen after I do nothing for a bit then the pc freezes have to restart

replies.body: If your entire pc is freezing it's likely the main problem lies with something other than League itself. Your pc might be struggling with rendering the client graphics, in which case low-spec mode in the client settings should be able to help. I'd also suggest you go ahead and check for any possible graphics drivers you might have missed recently.
